articles.title: India's coronavirus tally crosses 50 lakh after daily spike of 90,123 new cases - Mint
articles.description: The death toll due to coronavirus in the country rose to 82,066 after 1,290 deaths due to covid-19 were reported in the last 24 hours.With the single-day spike of 90,123 new covid-19 positive cases, India has reported total 50,20,360 cases
articles.content: India on Wednesday reported 90,123 new covid-19 cases. With this India, became the second country in the world to cross the five million mark after USA.With the single-day spike of 90,123 new covid-1… [+2359 chars]

articles.author: Agence France-Presse | Posted by Arpan Rai
articles.title: Donald Trump says coronavirus vaccine could be ready in a month - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Democrats have expressed concern that Trump is putting political pressure on government health regulators and scientists to approve a rushed vaccine in time to help turn around his uphill bid for reelection against challenger Joe Biden on November 3.

articles.title: Unlock 4: Schools and colleges to remain closed, Education Minister makes major announcement - Zee News
articles.description: As the tentacles of the coronavirus COVID-19 pandemic continue to tighten its grip, the students across the country have suffered the most as schools and colleges have been closed.

articles.title: China's coronavirus vaccine may be ready for public in November, says official - Deccan Herald
